verses.verse: But <S%G1722><s%> In <S%G1161><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Days <S%G3778><s%> Multiplying <S%G4129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> There Arose <S%G1096><s%> A Murmuring <S%G1112><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Hellenists <S%G1675><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hebrews, <S%G1445><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Were Overlooked <S%G3865><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ministration <S%G1248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Daily <S%G2522><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Widows. <S%G5503><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4341><s%> And Having Called To Them <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Seemly <S%G701><s%> It Is For <S%G2076><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Leaving <S%G2641><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> To Attend <S%G1247><s%> Tables. <S%G5132><s%>

Look Out <S%G1980><s%>, Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> Yourselves, <S%G5216><s%> Born Witness To <S%G3140><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> We Will Appoint <S%G2525><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G5532><s%> Business; <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ministry <S%G1248><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Will Steadfastly Continue. <S%G4342><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Pleasing <S%G700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saying <S%G3056><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude; <S%G4128><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Chose <S%G1586><s%> Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prochorus, <S%G4402><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nicanor, <S%G3527><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timon, <S%G5096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Parmenas, <S%G3937><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nicolas <S%G3532><s%> A Proselyte <S%G4339><s%> Of Antioch, <S%G491><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Set <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles; <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Prayed <S%G4336><s%> They Laid <S%G2007><s%> On Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Increased, <S%G837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Multiplied <S%G4129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> Exceedingly, <S%G4970><s%> <S%G4183><s%> And A Great <S%G5037><s%> Multitude <S%G3793><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> Were Obedient <S%G5219><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G4736><s%> And Stephen, <S%G1161><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power, <S%G1411><s%> Wrought <S%G4160><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Arose <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Libertines, <S%G3032><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Cyrenians, <S%G2956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Alexandrians, <S%G221><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Cilicia <S%G2791><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> Disputing <S%G4802><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Stephen. <S%G4736><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were <S%G3756><s%> Not Able <S%G2480><s%> To Resist <S%G436><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> By Which <S%G3739><s%> He Spoke. <S%G2980><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> They Suborned <S%G5260><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> We Have Heard <S%G191><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> Blasphemous <S%G989><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

They Stirred Up <S%G4787><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Coming Upon <S%G2186><s%> They Seized <S%G4884><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brought <S%G71><s%> Him To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim, <S%G4892><s%>

<S%G2476><s%> And They Set <S%G5037><s%> Witnesses <S%G3144><s%> False, <S%G5571><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Does <S%G3756><s%> Not Cease <S%G3973><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> Blasphemous <S%G989><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law; <S%G3551><s%>

We Have Heard <S%G191><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nazarene <S%G3480><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Will Destroy <S%G2647><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G5117><s%> Place, <S%G5126><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Change <S%G236><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Customs <S%G1485><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> Moses. <S%G3475><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Looking Intently <S%G816><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G537><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sat <S%G2516><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim <S%G4892><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> His <S%G846><s%> As The <S%G5616><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of An Angel. <S%G32><s%>
